column1: 78098950$Tsumuha-Kutsunagi the Lord of Swords$$WIND$[Warrior/effect]$$$$$11$3000$3000$$$$Cannot be Special Summoned. You can Tribute Summon this card by Tributing 1 Normal Summoned/Set monster. If this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: Activate this effect; your opponent can send any number of cards from their field to the GY
column2: then each player draws the same number of cards as were sent to the GY by this effect. During the End Phase of the turn this effect was activated
column3: shuffle all cards into the Deck from the field
column5: and that are banished. Once per turn
column7: if this card on the field was Normal Summoned or flipped face-up this turn: Return this card to the hand.$$$$$
